name: Orren
appearance: Broad-shouldered and spare, with river-wind weathering and a permanent smear of basalt dust on his cuffs. Wears a hinge-key chain at his belt and spectacles tinted against spray glare.
character: Exacting and paternal, views the city as a system that must be tuned. Slow to anger, slower to forgive errors that endanger lives.
talents: memories of every major flood schedule
flaws: pride blinds him to dockside realities
dreams: codify absolute hinge authority to prevent another Night of the Unmoored
restore and tune the rumored ribs beneath the First Hinge
leave a flood schedule so elegant it outlives him
secrets: Authorized a sealed culvert test that moved embargoed cargo for a political favor he regrets
Keeps a forbidden slate from the Shattered Weir etched with a hinge-song variant
Once overruled a Red Gale due to a gut feeling; three boats lived because of it
